lia.Monitor.JiniClient.ReflRouter
Class ReflRouter

java.lang.Object
  java.util.TimerTask
      lia.Monitor.JiniClient.ReflRouter.ReflRouter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class ReflRouter
extends java.util.TimerTask

This is invoked by main class of JReflRouter client from time to time to compute the MST and issue the routing change commands to the reflectors.

getMST

public java.util.Vector getMST()
Retunrs a vector with all tunnels currently in the MST. This is invoked by the GUI client
